description: Fix the division function to divide by the parameter 'b' instead of 0, which was causing a ZeroDivisionError. Also fix the add function that was incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. Additionally, add proper error handling for division by zero to follow best practices. - Fix the divide function to divide by 'b' instead of 0, and add explicit zero-check with clear error message
